T02D2140:205a-1: a'arya lo ke shva ra gu hya s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2140:205a-3: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2140:205a-4: dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2140:205a-6: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub ni //
T02D2140:205a-7: tshe 'di nyid la thob byed pa'i ;
T02D2140:205a-8: / spyan ras gzigs dbang gsang sgrub bshad //
T02D2140:205a-9: dad dang brtson 'grus snying rjer ldan //
T02D2140:205a-10: dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas nas //
T02D2140:205a-11: dur khrod g-y'a ri gangs brag gam //
T02D2140:205a-12: nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2140:205a-13: phyi rgyud pa la gtor ma gtang //
T02D2140:205a-14: mandal gru bzhi dris byugs la //
T02D2140:205a-15: chang dang bdud rtsis chag chag gdab //
T02D2140:205a-17: mu khyud gra chad ldan pa bri //
T02D2140:205a-18: sgo bzhi rgyal ldan bris kyang rung //
T02D2140:205a-19: rdo rje ra ba me ris bskor //
T02D2140:205a-20: chos 'byung dmar po re khal dkar //
T02D2140:205a-21: mtshams su g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri //
T02D2140:205a-22: pad 'dab phyogs tshon mtshams mdzes tshon //
T02D2140:205a-23: gru chang ljang la sgo bzhi phyogs //
T02D2140:205a-24: sgo rgyan la sogs spyi dang mthun //
T02D2140:205a-25: dkyil 'khor dbus bum rgyan ldan du //
T02D2140:205a-26: chad dang bdud rtsi ril bu blugs //
T02D2140:205a-27: dgos pa'i cha rkyen tshang bar gzhag / thod pa chang dang bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D2140:205a-28: bum pa'i khar bzhag dang dmar dga' //
T02D2140:205a-29: me long chang gis byugs pa la //
T02D2140:205a-31: sa bon yi ge bcas pa dgod //
T02D2140:205a-32: thod pa'i kha ru bzhag pa'i steng //
T02D2140:205a-33: sman sna rin chen sna tshogs dang //
T02D2140:205a-34: dri bzang dag dang snying po'i tshogs //
T02D2140:205a-35: ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi sogs //
T02D2140:205a-36: 'bru sna tshogs kyi phye ma la //
T02D2140:205a-37: gur gum gi wang sindhu ra //
T02D2140:205a-38: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga sbyar nas //
T02D2140:205b-0: chang gis @205b sbrus pa'i ril bu la //
T02D2140:205b-1: sindhu ra dang pad mtshal byug / mo gsar phrul 'khor lo bri //
T02D2140:205b-2: de la gong gi rdzas kyis byug / ri /
T02D2140:205b-3: bu 'khor lo'i lte bar gzhag / dar gyis bkab la me long khar //
T02D2140:205b-4: bzhag ste steng du dar gdugs phub //
T02D2140:205b-5: sba lcag dkar po tshigs gsum pa'i //
T02D2140:205b-6: nang du sngags dang 'khor lo gzhag / ril bu
T02D2140:205b-7: lha grangs la sogs bcug / kha ba cad mgo
T02D2140:205b-9: zhing lpags lcag 'bras btags pa la //
T02D2140:205b-10: rin chen lnga dang dung sogs dang //
T02D2140:205b-11: shel dang pha wang long bu btags //
T02D2140:205b-12: dar tshon sna lnga sngags ldan rgyan //
T02D2140:205b-13: dkyil 'khor dbus su gzugs par bya //
T02D2140:205b-14: gtor ma mchod pa tshogs kyi rdzas //
T02D2140:205b-15: ji ltar 'byor pa'i bye brag bsham //
T02D2140:205b-16: rkang gling thon rda tshil chen spos //
T02D2140:205b-17: zhun chen mar me la sogs bya //
T02D2140:205b-18: bgegs la blud byin mtshams bcad la //
T02D2140:205b-19: srung ba'i 'khor lo brtan par bsgom //
T02D2140:205b-20: dkon mchog spyan drangs phyag byas nas //
T02D2140:205b-21: mchod cing mandal dbul ba ste ;
T02D2140:205b-22: / bdun po rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D2140:205b-23: gsol ba drag tu gdab par bya //
T02D2140:205b-25: dngos gzhi phyi nang gsang gsum las //
T02D2140:205b-26: phyi ltar rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs //
T02D2140:205b-27: nang ltar lus la dgod pa dang //
T02D2140:205b-28: gsang ba rtsal dgod pa dang //
T02D2140:205b-29: yang gsang de nyid sems la dgod //
T02D2140:205b-30: dang po bsnyen sgrub las gsum ste //
T02D2140:205b-31: yang gsang 'bras bu'i do spros do //
T02D2140:205b-32: phyi ltar bsnyen pa bya ba ni //
T02D2140:205b-33: bde ba'i stan la bsam gtan gyi //
T02D2140:205b-34: phyag rgyas bsngad la skyabs 'gro dang //
T02D2140:205b-35: sems bskyed byas la stong pa'i dang //
T02D2140:205b-36: pad stong kha gsum gyis ba'i dbus //
T02D2140:205b-37: nyi zla'i gdan la rang sems hr'i: //
T02D2140:205b-39: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs su gyur //
T02D2140:205b-40: tshur 'dus sangs rgyas byin rlabs bsdus //
T02D2140:205b-41: hr'i: la thim pas 'od du zhu //
T02D2140:205b-42: rang nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang sku //
T02D2140:205b-43: dmar gsal zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
T02D2140:205b-44: rin chen rgyan rdzogs skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2140:205b-45: dang po'i phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar //
T02D2140:205b-48: ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis mdzes //
T02D2140:205b-49: rin chen ze'u 'bru'i srog ldan pa //
T02D2140:205b-50: spyan dmar zhal 'dzum thugs rje yis //
T02D2140:205b-51: sems can yongs la gzigs pa la //
T02D2140:206a-2: de ltar rang nyid gtso bo ni //
T02D2140:206a-3: rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa //
T02D2140:206a-5: bdag gi spyi gtsug pad zla'i steng //
T02D2140:206a-6: rtsa ba'i bla ma de nyid ni //
T02D2140:206a-7: 'od dpag med pa'i ngo bo ste //
T02D2140:206a-8: skyil krung mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can //
T02D2140:206a-9: sprul pa'i sku du bsgoms pa la //
T02D2140:206a-10: bka' brgyud bla ma rig 'dzin rnams //
T02D2140:206a-11: gcer bu spyan gsum rus rgyan can //
T02D2140:206a-12: rdo rje dril bus 'khyud pa yi //
T02D2140:206a-13: rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pas bskor //
T02D2140:206a-14: byin rlabs dbang bskur byas par bsgom //
T02D2140:206a-15: g-yas phyogs par sdong nyi ma'i steng //
T02D2140:206a-16: bdud bzhi'i gdan la rta mchog sku //
T02D2140:206a-17: dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D2140:206a-18: g-yas pa da ru g-yon sdigs mdzub //
T02D2140:206a-19: dril bur bcas pas dku la brtan //
T02D2140:206a-20: stag lpags dur khrod sgrul rgyan can //
T02D2140:206a-21: khro zhal spyan gsum mche bzhi gtsigs //
T02D2140:206a-22: ral ba dmar ser 'khyil pa'i dbus //
T02D2140:206a-23: rta mgo ljang gu rta skad mtsher //
T02D2140:206a-24: rdog ma dmar po me ltang 'bar //
T02D2140:206a-25: ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs pa //
T02D2140:206a-26: snang srid lha 'dre thams cad dang //
T02D2140:206a-27: klu rnams dbang du sdud par byed //
T02D2140:206a-28: zhabs gnyis g-yas gskum g-yon brkyang nas //
T02D2140:206a-29: ye shes me dpung dbus na bzhugs //
T02D2140:206a-30: 'khor du dpa' bo rgya mtsho'i tshogs //
T02D2140:206a-31: ye shes mkha' 'gro brgyad cu sogs //
T02D2140:206a-32: ha ha h'um h'um phat sgra sgrogs //
T02D2140:206a-33: snang srid zil gyis gnon par bsgom //
T02D2140:206a-34: g-yon phyogs pad sdong chos 'byung bsnol //
T02D2140:206a-35: de dbus pad nyi ro yi steng //
T02D2140:206a-36: gsang ba ye shes sku mdog dmar //
T02D2140:206a-37: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum dmar //
T02D2140:206a-38: khro 'dzum mche gtsigs spyan rtsa dmar //
T02D2140:206a-39: dbu skra grol zhing sku stong khebs //
T02D2140:206a-40: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ro gdan brdzis //
T02D2140:206a-41: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
T02D2140:206a-42: g-yas kyi dang po gri gug 'phyar //
T02D2140:206a-44: g-yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'dzin //
T02D2140:206a-46: thod skam lnga yis dbu brgyan zhing //
T02D2140:206a-47: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal can //
T02D2140:206a-48: rus pa'i rgyan cha lnga yis mdzes //
T02D2140:206a-49: rin chen dar dpyangs brgyan par bsgom //
T02D2140:206a-50: me ri 'bar ba'i dbus bzhugs shing //
T02D2140:206a-51: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro rgya mtshos bskor //
T02D2140:206a-52: aa ralli dang phem sgra sgrogs //
T02D2140:206a-53: ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud //
T02D2140:206a-54: snang srid dbang du sdud par bsgom //
T02D2140:206b-2: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dang //
T02D2140:206b-3: chos skyong dam can pho nya'i tshogs //
T02D2140:206b-4: phyi nang srung ma ma lus rnams //
T02D2140:206b-5: mkha' 'gro sde bzhi'i ngo bor gyur //
T02D2140:206b-6: gri gug thod khrag kha tv'am bsnams //
T02D2140:206b-7: thod pa skam rlon rus rgyan can //
T02D2140:206b-8: rin chen rgyan dang dar gyis mdzes //
T02D2140:206b-9: ha ri ni sa'i sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D2140:206b-11: de ltar dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D2140:206b-12: spyi bor zla steng aom dkar po //
T02D2140:206b-13: mgrin par pad steng a'a:dmar po //
T02D2140:206b-14: snying gar nyi steng h'um sngon po //
T02D2140:206b-15: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab //
T02D2140:206b-16: de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka ru //
T02D2140:206b-17: padma nyi ma'i gdan steng du //
T02D2140:206b-19: ye shes spyan drangs mchod la bstim //
T02D2140:206b-20: rigs lnga yab yum sems dpa' dang //
T02D2140:206b-21: khro bo'i tshogs dang mchod pa yi //
T02D2140:206b-22: lha mor bcas pa spyan drangs la //
T02D2140:206b-23: mchod de dbang bskur gsol ba btab //
T02D2140:206b-24: rgyal bas dbang bskur dgongs pa mdzad //
T02D2140:206b-25: khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bskrad cing //
T02D2140:206b-26: mchod pa'i lha mos mchod pa dang //
T02D2140:206b-27: yum lngas bum pa'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2140:206b-28: sdig sgrib dag nas spyi bo ru //
T02D2140:206b-29: rigs bdag snang ba mtha' yas dang //
T02D2140:206b-30: rigs lngas dbu la brgyan par bsgom //
T02D2140:206b-31: de ltar ji srid mi skyo'i bar //
T02D2140:206b-32: gsal bar bsgom pa bskyed rim yin //
T02D2140:206b-33: bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2140:206b-34: bdag dang rang bzhin gsang ba'i yum //
T02D2140:206b-35: spyi bor bla ma rigs bdag dang //
T02D2140:206b-36: kun gyi thugs kar pad nyi dang //
T02D2140:206b-37: zla ba'i gdan la hr'i:yig mthar //
T02D2140:206b-38: sngags kyis g-yas su bskor ba las ;
T02D2140:206b-40: mnyes nas byin rlabs dngos grub rnams //
T02D2140:206b-41: bdag la thim pas sdig sgrib dag / tshogs rdzogs dbang bzhi thob par bsam //
T02D2140:206b-42: khams gsum 'gro drug sems can la //
T02D2140:206b-43: 'od zer phog pas sgrib sbyang nas //
T02D2140:206b-44: phyi snod gzhal yas khang du gyur //
T02D2140:206b-45: nang bcud lha yi rang bzhin la //
T02D2140:206b-46: pho rnams spyan ras gzigs su gyur //
T02D2140:206b-47: mo rnams gsang ba ye shes la //
T02D2140:206b-48: bdud dang log 'dren rta mgrin sku //
T02D2140:206b-50: gzugs snang lha yi rang bzhin la //
T02D2140:207a-0: sgra grags thams cad sngags kyi @207a * //
T02D2140:207a-2: / sems kyi dran rtog chos sku'i dang //
T02D2140:207a-3: de ltar bzlas ba ci rigs bya //
T02D2140:207a-4: rjes su phyi snod nang bcud rnams //
T02D2140:207a-5: rim gyis thams cad bdag la bsdu //
T02D2140:207a-6: bdag kyang hr'i:nas stong ba'i bar //
T02D2140:207a-7: mi dmigs ma bcos spros bral ba //
T02D2140:207a-8: mi dmigs ci yang mi bsam par ;
T02D2140:207a-9: / chos sku'i ngang la ci gnas gzhag / dge ba bsngo zhing smon lam gdab //
T02D2140:207a-10: thun mtshams lha yi nga rgyal dang //
T02D2140:207a-11: spyod lam rnam bzhi thams cad bya //
T02D2140:207a-12: aom a'a:h'um hr'i:aom ma ni padme h'um //
T02D2140:207a-14: aom hr'i:badzra khro dha ha ya gr'i wa hu lu hu lu h'um dza:rta mgrin gyi snying po'o //
T02D2140:207a-15: aom dhu ma gha ye na ma sv'a h'a /
T02D2140:207a-16: gsang ba ye shes kyi snying po'o //
T02D2140:207a-17: d'a ki n'i ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya h'um dza:/
T02D2140:207a-18: mkha' 'gro sde bzhi yum gyi snying po'o //
T02D2140:207a-26: wa sham ku ru h'um h'um /
T02D2140:207a-30: dbang du bsdu ba'i snying po'o //
T02D2140:207a-31: de ltar phyi sgrub bsnyen pa la //
T02D2140:207a-32: dkyil 'khor bcu bzhi mi dgos so //
T02D2140:207a-33: rgyun du yi dam nar mar bya //
T02D2140:207a-35: nang ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gi / lha rnams lus la dgod pa ni //
T02D2140:207a-36: sngon 'gro yan lag bdun pa dang //
T02D2140:207a-37: skyabs su 'gro zhing sems bskyed nas //
T02D2140:207a-38: tshad med bzhi yis blo sbyangs te //
T02D2140:207a-39: stong pa'i ngang las pad nyi dang //
T02D2140:207a-40: zla ba'i gdan la hr'i:dmar po //
T02D2140:207a-42: gong ltar bdag nyid sbyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:207a-43: 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dmar //
T02D2140:207a-44: zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs skyil krung//
T02D2140:207a-46: phyi sgrub ji lta ba ru gsal //
T02D2140:207a-47: bla ma rigs bdag bka' brgyud bcas //
T02D2140:207a-48: spyi bor rdo rje 'chang ltar bsgom //
T02D2140:207a-50: nyi zla'i gdan la rta mgrin ni //
T02D2140:207a-51: dmar nag dur khrod chas kyis brgyan //
T02D2140:207a-52: g-yas pa dbang sdud phyag rgya yis ;
T02D2140:207a-54: g-yon pa autpal dmar po yi //
T02D2140:207a-55: zhags par bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis //
T02D2140:207a-56: dku la brten nas gar stabs mdzad //
T02D2140:207a-57: de yi thugs kar padma dang //
T02D2140:207a-58: nyi zla'i dbus su hr'i:la sngags //
T02D2140:207b-0: lte bar chos 'byung ba sgoms @207b pa'i steng //
T02D2140:207b-1: padma nyi ma ro steng du //
T02D2140:207b-2: gsang ba ye shes mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2140:207b-4: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro yab yum ste //
T02D2140:207b-5: shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro dkar //
T02D2140:207b-6: lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro seng //
T02D2140:207b-8: byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang //
T02D2140:207b-9: yab rnams yum dang mtshungs pa ste //
T02D2140:207b-10: gri gug thod khrag rgyan dang ldan //
T02D2140:207b-11: lte ba'i yum gyi gdan nas bteg / de nas sku gsung thugs byin brlab //
T02D2140:207b-12: ye shes bstims nas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2140:207b-13: lte bar bde chen gtum mo'i me 'bar dmigs //
T02D2140:207b-14: rlung bzung dbang bsdus byang sems rin chen bzhu //
T02D2140:207b-15: rdubs nas me la bstims pas ye shes 'bar //
T02D2140:207b-16: 'khor 'das gnyis med dgongs pa bskyang bar bsam //
T02D2140:207b-17: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs rlung dang bsre /
T02D2140:207b-18: me la bstims la longs sku bde chen bskyed //
T02D2140:207b-19: 'gro drug sems can dbang bsdus byang sems bsgom //
T02D2140:207b-20: snying rje bskyed dus rlung rdub me la bstim//
T02D2140:207b-21: sprul skus 'gro 'dul phreng las ci yang ston //
T02D2140:207b-22: dmigs med ngang nas rlung bzung cir mi dgongs //
T02D2140:207b-23: mkha' ltar dag pa chos sku mngon du gyur //
T02D2140:207b-24: sngags bzlas dus su 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs //
T02D2140:207b-25: me ltar tshal gdung ba'i tshogs 'phros pas //
T02D2140:207b-26: skye 'gro'i snying nas bzung ste bkug byas la //
T02D2140:207b-27: rig pa'i ngo bo thugs ka'i hr'i:la thim //
T02D2140:207b-28: lus po 'od du zhu nas lte bar sdud //
T02D2140:207b-29: mkha' 'gro yab yum pho mo'i snying po la //
T02D2140:207b-30: dngos grub sdud pa'i sngags ltar bzlas pa bya //
T02D2140:207b-31: rjes su lha rnams thams cad rang sar zhu //
T02D2140:207b-32: mkha' la sprin dengs lta bur yal ba'i dang //
T02D2140:207b-33: ma bcos dmigs gtad med pa'i dang nyid las //
T02D2140:207b-34: ma bcos blo yis mi dpyad mi bsgom par //
T02D2140:207b-35: gzung 'dzin blang dor yid byed med pa'i rang //
T02D2140:207b-36: dngos po'i rang bzhin gsal dang bde stod dang //
T02D2140:207b-37: chags 'dzin ma bya rnam dag de rang bskyong //
T02D2140:207b-38: rjes su thun mtshams bya ba gong ltar bya //
T02D2140:207b-39: nang du lus la lha dgod bsgrub pa'o//
T02D2140:207b-40: gsang ba rtsa la dgod pa ni //
T02D2140:207b-41: rim par nyams su blang bya ba //
T02D2140:207b-42: stan la bsam gtan phyag rgyas gnas //
T02D2140:207b-43: sngon 'gro yan lag bdun pa bya //
T02D2140:207b-44: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed tshad med bzhi //
T02D2140:207b-45: sh'u n+ya t'a yis stong par bsgam //
T02D2140:207b-46: chos nyid stong par byang chub dang //
T02D2140:208a-0: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes @208a * //
T02D2140:208a-2: / stong pa'i ngang las pad nyid dang //
T02D2140:208a-3: zla ba rgyas pa'i gdan bsgom ste //
T02D2140:208a-4: nyi zla'i gdan la mngon byang chub //
T02D2140:208a-5: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D2140:208a-6: gdan ste rang rig yi ge hr'i: //
T02D2140:208a-7: gsung yig 'bru la mngon byang chub //
T02D2140:208a-8: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D2140:208a-12: thugs kyi phyag mtshan mngon byang chub //
T02D2140:208a-13: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2140:208a-15: 'gro ba'i rgyud sbyangs lhar gyur nas //
T02D2140:208a-16: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs bsdus //
T02D2140:208a-17: sdang gyi hr'i:sa mtshan padmar thim //
T02D2140:208a-18: de nyid yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D2140:208a-19: bdag nyid lha yi skur rdzogs pa //
T02D2140:208a-20: yongs su rdzogs las mngon byang chub //
T02D2140:208a-21: bya ba nan tan ye shes so //
T02D2140:208a-22: de yang bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:208a-23: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar //
T02D2140:208a-24: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar gyis 'gyid //
T02D2140:208a-25: dbu skra gyen brdzes dar gyis brgyan //
T02D2140:208a-26: rin chen dar gyis mdzes bar spras //
T02D2140:208a-27: phyag g-yas pad phreng g-yon pad dmar //
T02D2140:208a-28: gsang ba ye shes yum gyis 'khyud //
T02D2140:208a-29: dmar mo gcer bu spyan gsum ma //
T02D2140:208a-30: phyag g-yas gri gug g-yon thod khrag / thod pa skam rlon rus rgyan can //
T02D2140:208a-31: rin chen sna tshogs dar dpyangs brgyan //
T02D2140:208a-32: ye shes me ri'i dbus su bzhugs //
T02D2140:208a-33: de yi sku yi rtsa gsum dang //
T02D2140:208a-34: 'khor lo bzhi sogs gsal btab la //
T02D2140:208a-35: spyi bor bde chen 'khor lo la //
T02D2140:208a-36: rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi //
T02D2140:208a-37: dbus su bde gshegs spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:208a-38: dkar po 'khor lo dril bu can //
T02D2140:208a-39: bde gshegs mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis //
T02D2140:208a-40: 'khor lo gri gug thod khrag can //
T02D2140:208a-41: rus pa rin chen rgyan ldan bskor //
T02D2140:208a-42: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na //
T02D2140:208a-43: rtsa 'dab bcu drug dbus su ni //
T02D2140:208a-44: padma rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:208a-45: dmar po padma dril bu can //
T02D2140:208a-47: padma gri gug thod khrag can //
T02D2140:208a-48: rus pa rin chen rgyan ldan bskor //
T02D2140:208a-49: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na //
T02D2140:208a-50: rtsa 'dab brgyad kyi dngus su ni //
T02D2140:208a-51: rdo rje rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:208a-52: mthing la rin chen dril bu can //
T02D2140:208a-53: rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad //
T02D2140:208a-54: rdo rje gri gug thod khrag can //
T02D2140:208a-55: rus pa rin chen rgyan ldan bskor //
T02D2140:208b-0: lte ba sprul @208b pa'i 'khor lo na //
T02D2140:208b-1: rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa gnyis dbus //
T02D2140:208b-2: rin chen rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:208b-3: ser po rin chen dril bu can //
T02D2140:208b-4: rin chen mkha' 'gro drug cu bzhi //
T02D2140:208b-5: rin chen gri gug thod khrag can //
T02D2140:208b-6: rus pa rin chen rgyan ldan bskor //
T02D2140:208b-7: gsang gnas nor bu'i 'khor lo ru //
T02D2140:208b-8: rtsa 'dab bzhi yi dbus su ni //
T02D2140:208b-9: las kyi rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2140:208b-10: ljang gu rgya gram dril bu can //
T02D2140:208b-11: las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang gu bzhi //
T02D2140:208b-12: rgya gram gri gug thod khrag thogs //
T02D2140:208b-13: rus pa rin chen rgyan ldan bskor //
T02D2140:208b-14: de ltar 'khor lo'i lha rnams te //
T02D2140:208b-15: slar yang snying po rgyan gyi lha //
T02D2140:208b-16: yab kyi thugs kar rta mgrin dang //
T02D2140:208b-17: sbyi bor bla ma lte ba ru //
T02D2140:208b-18: dpa' bo sde bzhi bsgom par bya //
T02D2140:208b-19: de bzhin yum gyi thugs kar yar //
T02D2140:208b-20: rdo rje phag mo zhal gnyis ma //
T02D2140:208b-21: spyi bor na bza' dkar mo dang //
T02D2140:208b-22: lte bar rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro bsgom //
T02D2140:208b-23: kun kyang thod pa skam rlon dang //
T02D2140:208b-24: rin chen rus rgyan dar gyis mdzes //
T02D2140:208b-25: padma nyi zla ro gdan can //
T02D2140:208b-26: me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs //
T02D2140:208b-27: de ltar gsal bar bsgom byas nas //
T02D2140:208b-28: sku gsung thugs ldan byin rlabs te //
T02D2140:208b-29: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs bstim //
T02D2140:208b-30: dbang bskur dbang rtags dbu rgyan la //
T02D2140:208b-31: de nas rang gi mdoms par nas //
T02D2140:208b-32: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor g-yos //
T02D2140:208b-33: gsang gnas lha tshogs me 'bar te //
T02D2140:208b-34: 'khor lo bzhi yi gtso bo rnams //
T02D2140:208b-35: ltos chags med pa'i me 'bar te //
T02D2140:208b-36: lte ba'i aa la gtugs nas ni //
T02D2140:208b-37: me 'bar ham la reg pa yis //
T02D2140:208b-38: byang chub sems kyi rgyun bab pas //
T02D2140:208b-39: 'khor lo bzhi gang lha tshogs rnams //
T02D2140:208b-40: bde ba chen por 'bar ba dang //
T02D2140:208b-41: dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus dang //
T02D2140:208b-42: skye 'gro sems can byams ldang sogs //
T02D2140:208b-43: dus dang gnad du gang 'gro ba //
T02D2140:208b-44: rlung dang dbyer med bsdus la bstim //
T02D2140:208b-45: me 'bar nyon mongs rab bsregs nas//
T02D2140:208b-46: stong nyid snying rje chen po'i dang //
T02D2140:208b-47: gnyug ma yid la mi byed pa //
T02D2140:208b-48: tha mal shes pa ma bcos dang //
T02D2140:208b-49: rang rig dri med bskyang byas la //
T02D2140:208b-50: rlung bzung rig pa phyogs ming sbyang //
T02D2140:208b-51: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor bum pa dang //
T02D2140:208b-52: thod pa me long 'khor lo dang //
T02D2140:209a-0: dril bu sba lcag dag la @209a * //
T02D2140:209a-2: / rang nyid ji lta'i bskyed bstim bya //
T02D2140:209a-3: bdag dang de rnams thugs ka nas //
T02D2140:209a-4: 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs //
T02D2140:209a-6: gang dmigs la sogs skye 'gro yi //
T02D2140:209a-7: pho yi snying dang mo yi ni //
T02D2140:209a-8: gsang ba'i gnas nas bzung nas ni //
T02D2140:209a-9: rang dbang med par mdun du bkug /'od zer 'phros bas phog pa yis //
T02D2140:209a-10: de rnams 'od du zhu nas ni //
T02D2140:209a-11: byang sems dkar dmar rnam par gyur //
T02D2140:209a-12: ril bu la sogs rdzas rnams dang //
T02D2140:209a-13: rang gi gsang bar bsdus la bstim //
T02D2140:209a-15: byams dang snying rje drag tu bsgom //
T02D2140:209a-16: rlung bzung sngags bzlas gang goms bya //
T02D2140:209a-17: thun rjes thogs rim thun mtshams su //
T02D2140:209a-18: bsngo ba smon lam spyod lam bya //
T02D2140:209a-19: thun bzhi thun drug la sogs spyad //
T02D2140:209a-20: tshogs dang gtor mas thun mtshams mchod //
T02D2140:209a-21: bstod pas bstod cing bkra shis brjod //
T02D2140:209a-22: yig brgya la sogs bshags pa bya //
T02D2140:209a-24: dngos grub mtshan ma la sogs pa //
T02D2140:209a-25: bzang dan bye brag ji ltar yang //
T02D2140:209a-26: rmi lam bzang dang ngan la sogs //
T02D2140:209a-27: gang la'ang dga' dang mi dga' yi //
T02D2140:209a-29: de ltar zhag bdun nyer gcig dang //
T02D2140:209a-30: zla gsum zla drug la sogs par //
T02D2140:209a-31: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub bsgrub //
T02D2140:209a-32: de nas sgrub pa tshar rjes su //
T02D2140:209a-33: ril bu 'khor lo lus la bcad //
T02D2140:209a-34: siddh'u ra yis spyi bor byug / dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang //
T02D2140:209a-35: lte ba gsang gnas dag tu byug / bum pa'i chu yis bkru btung bya //
T02D2140:209a-36: thod chang btung la dngos grub blang //
T02D2140:209a-37: gtor ma la sogs sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2140:209a-38: bum chu gang blud dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2140:209a-39: sba lcag bzad zhing glad la bskor //
T02D2140:209a-41: sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor zla gam khar //
T02D2140:209a-42: dbang gi shing dmar zla gam brtsigs //
T02D2140:209a-43: me sbar lha tshogs bskyed par bya //
T02D2140:209a-44: ye shes pa bstim mchod bstod dbul //
T02D2140:209b-0: sreg rdzas 'dod yon @209b sna tshogs dang //
T02D2140:209b-1: ril bu mar dang 'phru sna bsreg / zas nor gos dang rin po che //
T02D2140:209b-3: gsol ba gang ba cing mchod bstod bya //
T02D2140:209b-4: rjes su ye shes sems dpa' gshegs //
T02D2140:209b-5: thal ba chu bo'i gzhung du dor //
T02D2140:209b-6: de yis snang ba dbang du 'gyur//
T02D2140:209b-7: rtsa la bkod pa'i sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D2140:209b-8: las spyor lta bur bzhed pa yin //
T02D2140:209b-9: yang gsang sems la bkod pa ni //
T02D2140:209b-10: dben gnas phyi ru mi btsal te //
T02D2140:209b-11: lus 'di gzhal yas khang nyid yin //
T02D2140:209b-12: lha sku logs su mi btsal te //
T02D2140:209b-13: sems nyid skye 'gag med ba de //
T02D2140:209b-14: rigs kyi bdag po bla ma yin //
T02D2140:209b-15: ma rtogs nyon mongs gti mug 'di //
T02D2140:209b-16: rtogs grol thugs rje chen po yin //
T02D2140:209b-17: yid byed rtog tshogs 'phro ba de //
T02D2140:209b-18: rtogs pas sangs rgyas stong rtsa yin //
T02D2140:209b-19: zhe sdang gdug rtsub ldan pa de //
T02D2140:209b-20: gzhi med rtogs pas rta mgrin yin //
T02D2140:209b-21: 'dod sems gdung ba tur tur de //
T02D2140:209b-22: rtsa bral rtogs pas gsang ye yin //
T02D2140:209b-23: nyon mongs nga rgyal rtog tshogs rnams //
T02D2140:209b-24: ngar 'dzin bral ba sa dpa' bo yin //
T02D2140:209b-25: phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshub pa de //
T02D2140:209b-26: re dogs zad pas dpa' mo yin //
T02D2140:209b-27: chu khams khrag dang rnam shes dag / rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2140:209b-28: sa khams sha dang tshor ba de //
T02D2140:209b-29: rin chen mkha' 'gro zhes su grags //
T02D2140:209b-30: me khams drod dang 'du shes de //
T02D2140:209b-32: rlung khams dbugs dang 'du byed de //
T02D2140:209b-33: las kyi mkha' 'gro zhes su grags //
T02D2140:209b-34: nam mkha'i khams dang sems nyid gzugs //
T02D2140:209b-36: skye mched tshogs drug de yi yul //
T02D2140:209b-37: 'dod yon mchod pa'i lha mo yin //
T02D2140:209b-38: dge dang mi dge'i rtogs tshogs rnams //
T02D2140:209b-39: dam can bka' sdod srung dmar bshad //
T02D2140:209b-40: de ltar sems kyi ngo bo de //
T02D2140:209b-42: de shes rtogs pas mya ngan 'das //
T02D2140:209b-43: lha sku sems kyi rang rtsal de //
T02D2140:209b-44: dngos por bzung bas 'khrul pa ste //
T02D2140:209b-45: lha yang sems nyid chos skur gsal //
T02D2140:210a-1: ni smra brjod bral ba'i phyir //
T02D2140:210a-2: phyi nang rlung gi rgyu ba yang //
T02D2140:210a-3: smras tshad grag stong brjod med yin //
T02D2140:210a-4: gdod nas dag pa'i rig pa 'di //
T02D2140:210a-5: ye nas chos skur gnas pa la //
T02D2140:210a-6: ngo sbrad de ngo shes pa yin //
T02D2140:210a-7: chos dbyings ye shes rtogs pa la //
T02D2140:210a-8: sangs rgyas zhes su grags pa'o //
T02D2140:210a-10: de sbyangs chos sku'i ngo bo la //
T02D2140:210a-11: gzung bar bya ba'i yul tsam med //
T02D2140:210a-12: drod rtags tshad dang nyams myong la //
T02D2140:210a-13: ma chags rang byung rtsad nas dag / rang don chos sku mngon gyur te //
T02D2140:210a-14: gzhan don gzugs sku lhun grub 'byung //
T02D2140:210a-16: snyan brgyud dri ma med pa'o //
